short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides all promoted posts an reddit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of all the ad/promoted posts on reddit? Well with this little extension they will be a thing of the past. Any promoted post on reddit will be hidden from view. 

To run the extension, simply enable the extension it and it should work automatically when you use reddit.

Have any issues? Want to add or suggest new features? Checkout the GitHub here - https://github.com/ghughes13/csl-reddit-filter-promoted/issues
